Docs.summary: Encrypts or decrypts data in a single-part operation, or finishes a multiple-part operation.
Docs.returns: the number of bytes stored in output

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the size of the output buffer is too small.
if the size of the resulting bytes is not a multiple of the cipher block size.
if the padding of the data does not match the padding scheme.
if the input buffer and the output buffer are the same object.
if this cipher instance is not initialized for encryption or decryption.
